function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Physical contact between pedestrians in confined spaces","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through direct physical contact","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce physical contact between pedestrians, such as limiting occupancy or creating physical barriers","Technologies":"Social distancing markers, occupancy sensors, contact tracing systems","People":"Occupants and visitors of confined spaces","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Occupant exposure in confined spaces based on social distance radius","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity of people within a confined space","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing guidelines and use technology to monitor and enforce safe distances between individuals","Technologies":"Proximity sensors, occupancy tracking systems, real-time occupancy monitoring","People":"Occupants and visitors of confined spaces","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Exposure to contagious diseases through face-to-face contact within social distance radius","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission when individuals are in close proximity and facing each other","Mitigation":"Promote face masks usage, implement physical barriers, and enforce social distancing measures to minimize face-to-face interactions","Technologies":"Face recognition technology for mask detection, transparent barriers, face-to-face interaction monitoring systems","People":"Occupants and visitors of confined spaces","Owner":"Facility managers, architects, and urban planners"}]}
